name: Narration Footnotes
title: Narration Footnotes
desc: "Suspect, try and look more serious. Heroes, more natural please, happy smiles! ...But no smiling from the victim or their friends and family, thank you. No, no, don't get up! Stay on the ground, we need to capture the crime scene as-is!"

skills.desc:
Both sides summon 1 Toy Guard.
(Toy Guard: End Phase: Deal 1 Physical DMG.
Usage(s): 2)
